posts.header: Brett's first ever sponsored TTRPG Campaign - Lords of the Fallen - will premiere October 27th at 8pm EST - starring TheCrownedDM, Joefudge, SciFri and SummersSalt!!.
Curious Curios will be returning at some point in October.

Pipe Dreamers is now on Indefinite Hiatus.

 There will be no wrap up session, no fanart session, and pcs from Pipe Dreamers will not appear in future cameos.
